content:
4.  damage to tyres or rims unless damage is caused to other parts of the Insured Vehicle simultaneously in the same accident.
5.  any loss or damage arising from a criminal breach of trust.
6.  any transport expenses or any losses due to unavailability of parts or Accessories.
7.  any loss or damage to personal items in the Insured Vehicle.
8.  any loss or damage to Accessories not installed by the car distributor and/or manufacturer.
questions: What conditions must be met for tyre or rim damage to be covered under the insurance policy?
Is damage to tyres covered if no other part of the vehicle is damaged in the accident?
Does the insurance cover losses arising from criminal activities?
Are transport expenses covered under this insurance policy?
What happens if parts or accessories for the vehicle are unavailable?
Is there coverage for personal items inside the vehicle in case of damage or loss?
Does the insurance cover accessories that were not installed by the car's distributor or manufacturer?
What types of damages or losses are not covered by this insurance policy?
Can I claim for rim damage if it occurred without any other vehicle damage?
Are losses due to criminal breach of trust covered by this vehicle insurance?
